verses.verse: וַיֻּגַּ֖ד <S%H5046><s%> And it was told לְיוֹאָ֑ב <S%H3097><s%> Joab הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Behold the king בֹּכֶ֛ה <S%H1058><s%> weepeth וַיִּתְאַבֵּ֖ל <S%H56><s%> and mourneth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for אַבְשָׁלֹֽם׃ <S%H53><s%> for Absalom

וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> was turned הַתְּשֻׁעָ֜ה <S%H8668><s%> And the victory בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְאֵ֖בֶל <S%H60><s%> was [turned] into mourning לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> for the people בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> say נֶעֱצַ֥ב <S%H6087><s%> was grieved הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> how the king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> for his son

וַיִּתְגַּנֵּ֥ב <S%H1589><s%> them by stealth הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> gat הָעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> into the city כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after יִתְגַּנֵּ֗ב <S%H1589><s%> steal away הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> as people הַנִּכְלָמִ֔ים <S%H3637><s%> being ashamed בְּנוּסָ֖ם <S%H5127><s%> when they flee בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> in battle

וְהַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> But the king לָאַ֣ט <S%H3813><s%> covered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> his face וַיִּזְעַ֥ק <S%H2199><s%> cried הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> with a loud בְּנִי֙ <S%H1121><s%> O my son אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H53><s%> Absalom אַבְשָׁל֖וֹם <S%H53><s%> O Absalom בְּנִ֥י <S%H1121><s%> my son בְנִֽי׃ <S%H1121><s%> my son ס

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> came יוֹאָ֛ב <S%H3097><s%> And Joab אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> into the house וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> and said הֹבַ֨שְׁתָּ <S%H3001><s%> Thou hast shamed הַיּ֜וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the faces כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <S%H5650><s%> of all thy servants הַֽמְמַלְּטִ֤ים <S%H4422><s%> have saved אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשְׁךָ֙ <S%H5315><s%> thy life הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> which this day וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> נֶ֤פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and the lives בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> of thy sons וּבְנֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H1323><s%> and of thy daughters וְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and the lives נָשֶׁ֔יךָ <S%H802><s%> of thy wives וְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and the lives פִּלַגְשֶֽׁיךָ׃ <S%H6370><s%> of thy concubines

לְאַֽהֲבָה֙ <S%H157><s%> In that thou lovest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֹׂ֣נְאֶ֔יךָ <S%H8130><s%> thine enemies וְלִשְׂנֹ֖א <S%H8130><s%> and hatest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹהֲבֶ֑יךָ <S%H157><s%> thy friends כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <S%H5046><s%> For thou hast declared הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> are nothing לְךָ֙ שָׂרִ֣ים <S%H8269><s%> that thou regardest neither princes וַעֲבָדִ֔ים <S%H5650><s%> nor servants כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for יָדַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I perceive הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for this day כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for [לֹא כ] (ל֣וּ <S%H3863><s%> if ק) אַבְשָׁל֥וֹם <S%H53><s%> Absalom חַי֙ <S%H2416><s%> had lived וְכֻלָּ֤נוּ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> this day מֵתִ֔ים <S%H4191><s%> and all we had died כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> then יָשָׁ֥ר <S%H3477><s%> convenient בְּעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5869><s%> affliction

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now ק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> Now therefore arise צֵ֔א <S%H3318><s%> go forth וְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> and speak עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> comfortably עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servants כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> if בַיהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> by the LORD נִשְׁבַּ֜עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> for I swear כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> if אֵינְךָ֣ <S%H369><s%> not יוֹצֵ֗א <S%H3318><s%> if thou go not forth אִם־ <S%H518><s%> surely יָלִ֨ין <S%H3885><s%> there will not tarry אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אִתְּךָ֙ <S%H854><s%> for הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> with thee this night וְרָעָ֧ה <S%H7451><s%> unto thee than all the evil לְךָ֣ זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> adversity אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that בָּ֣אָה <S%H935><s%> that befell עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> upon מִנְּעֻרֶ֖יךָ <S%H5271><s%> thee from thy youth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עָֽתָּה׃ <S%H6258><s%> now ס

וַיָּ֥קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and sat בַּשָּׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> in the gate וּֽלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֞ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people הִגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> And they told לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> Behold the king יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> doth sit בַּשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> in the gate וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> came כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And all the people לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> for Israel נָ֖ס <S%H5127><s%> had fled אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <S%H168><s%> to his tent ס

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And all the people נָד֔וֹן <S%H1777><s%> were at strife בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> throughout all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> The king הִצִּילָ֣נוּ ׀ <S%H5337><s%> saved מִכַּ֣ף <S%H3709><s%> us out of the hand אֹיְבֵ֗ינוּ <S%H341><s%> of our enemies וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִלְּטָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H4422><s%> and he delivered מִכַּ֣ף <S%H3709><s%> us out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> now בָּרַ֥ח <S%H1272><s%> and now he is fled מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from אַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H53><s%> for Absalom

וְאַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H53><s%> And Absalom אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom מָשַׁ֣חְנוּ <S%H4886><s%> whom we anointed עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> over מֵ֖ת <S%H4191><s%> over us is dead בַּמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> in battle וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now לָמָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> why אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> are you מַחֲרִשִׁ֖ים <S%H2790><s%> Now therefore why speak לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> back אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> the king ס

וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David שָׁ֠לַח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צָד֨וֹק <S%H6659><s%> to Zadok וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and אֶבְיָתָ֥ר <S%H54><s%> and to Abiathar הַכֹּהֲנִים֮ <S%H3548><s%> the priests לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying דַּבְּר֞וּ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זִקְנֵ֤י <S%H2205><s%> unto the elders יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִֽהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> are you אַֽחֲרֹנִ֔ים <S%H314><s%> Why are ye the last לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> back אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> [even] to his house וּדְבַר֙ <S%H1697><s%> the word כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of all Israel בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> is come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> house

אַחַ֣י <S%H251><s%> Ye [are] my brethren אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> you עַצְמִ֥י <S%H6106><s%> ye [are] my bones וּבְשָׂרִ֖י <S%H1320><s%> and my flesh אַתֶּ֑ם <S%H859><s%> you וְלָ֧מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תִהְי֛וּ <S%H1961><s%> should אַחֲרֹנִ֖ים <S%H314><s%> wherefore then are ye the last לְהָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> to bring back אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> king

וְלַֽעֲמָשָׂא֙ <S%H6021><s%> ye to Amasa תֹּֽמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> And say הֲל֛וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not עַצְמִ֥י <S%H6106><s%> [Art] thou not of my bone וּבְשָׂרִ֖י <S%H1320><s%> body אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> so יַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> do לִּ֤י אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> angels וְכֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> also יוֹסִ֔יף <S%H3254><s%> so to me and more אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֠א <S%H3808><s%> not שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> also if thou be not captain צָבָ֞א <S%H6635><s%> of the host תִּהְיֶ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְפָנַ֛י <S%H6440><s%> before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> me הַיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> me continually תַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> in the room יוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H3097><s%> of Joab

וַיַּ֛ט <S%H5186><s%> And he bowed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבַ֥ב <S%H3824><s%> the heart כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> of all the men יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah כְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> even as [the heart of] one וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> so that they sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [this word] unto the king שׁ֥וּב <S%H7725><s%> Return אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> thou and all thy servants

וַיָּ֣שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> So the king וַיָּבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> to Jordan וִיהוּדָ֞ה <S%H3063><s%> And Judah בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> came הַגִּלְגָּ֗לָה <S%H1537><s%> to Gilgal לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> to go לִקְרַ֣את <S%H7125><s%> to meet הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לְהַעֲבִ֥יר <S%H5674><s%> over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan
